task: Explore the ManageNotetypes page to learn about managing note types.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu has interacted with key widgets on the ManageNotetypes page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has content_desc "保存"

By touching the button with content description "保存," the screen transitioned from the CardTemplateEditor to ManageNotetypes. The button "保存" is no longer visible, and new text views and buttons related to managing note types are now present on the current screen. (page changed from CardTemplateEditor to ManageNotetypes)
Touch on a button that has content_desc "搜索"
By touching the "搜索" button, the button with content_desc "搜索" was replaced with a button labeled "收起" and a focused button for searching.
Touch on a button that has text "编辑卡片"

After touching the button "编辑卡片" on the previous screen "ManageNotetypes", the current screen "CardTemplateEditor" shows additional options such as "保存", "预览", and "更多选项" for editing the card template. The screen now displays fields for editing the front and back of the card template. (page changed from ManageNotetypes to CardTemplateEditor)
Touch on a button that has content_desc "更多选项"
After touching the button with content_desc "更多选项", the screen has changed to include new buttons with text "卡片浏览器外观," "插入字段," and "以 Markdown 格式复制."

The actions taken by fufu seem to be leading away from the initial task of exploring the ManageNotetypes page. fufu needs to explore the widgets related to managing note types on the ManageNotetypes page.
Touch on a button that has text "卡片浏览器外观"

The button "卡片浏览器外观" has led to the transition from the CardTemplateEditor to the CardTemplateBrowserAppearanceEditor screen, where new options for editing the card template appearance are available, such as "转到上一层级" and "保存". (page changed from CardTemplateEditor to CardTemplateBrowserAppearanceEditor)
Touch on a textfield that has text "问题格式"
By touching on the textfield with the text "问题格式," it now becomes a focused textfield with the same text, indicating that it is ready for user input.
